item.title: Boombox
item.description: My take on creating a boombox - a 10kg booming monster How I made it: Link to heading Front design in SketchUp Link to heading This is my initial idea of two full range drivers and one “subwoofer” driver to deliver the bass. I was a little enthusiastic with the dimensions and the finished product is a lot smaller than this. Back design in SketchUp Link to heading Three chambers - one for each speaker.
